Label: Cluster Spacecraft 2, ASPOC Prime Parameters - W. Riedler (IWF-OAW)

DatasetLink.Title: Cluster Science Archive
DatasetLink.Text: High resolution Cluster data from the

VariableDescription.Name: Status__C2_PP_ASP
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STSP Cluster>Solar Terrestrial Science Programme, Cluster
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     VALIDITY                        Validated - minor caveats
#     VALIDATOR                       ASPOC:PI W.Riedler>IWF/OEAW>Klaus.Torkar@oeaw.ac.at
#     CAVEATS                         See also `TEXT' global attr. for Caveats file location
#                                     Commissioning data. Validated for CVP SFT
#                                     Instrument operation mode:Standby
#     STATUS_KEY                      Status[0]= 0 = Bad data
#                                     Status[0]= 1 = Use with caution
#                                     Status[0]= 2 = OK
#                                     Status[0]= 255 = Not Supplied
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx000 = standby
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx001 = constant total current
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx010 = constant beam current
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx011 = feedback from EFW
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx100 = hot standby
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx101 = test and commissioning
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx110 = technical
#                                     Status[1]= xxxxx111 = feedback from PEACE
#                                     Status[1]= xxxx0xxx = no startup
#                                     Status[1]= xxxx1xxx = startup in progress
#                                     Status[1]= xxx0xxxx = backup mode inactive
#                                     Status[1]= xxx1xxxx = backup mode active
#                                     Status[1]= 11111111 = mode undefined
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxxx00 = filament 0
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxxx01 = filament 1
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxxx10 = filament 2
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxxx11 = filament 3
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxx0xx = module A
#                                     Status[2]= xxxxx1xx = module B
#                                     Status[2]= 11111111 = emitter selection undefined
#                                     Status[3]= 00000000 = OK
#                                     Status[3]= xxxxxxx1 = no ignition
#                                     Status[3]= xxxxxx1x = no beam current
#                                     Status[3]= xxxxx1xx = EFW data not valid
#                                     Status[3]= xxxx1xxx = PEACE data not valid
#                                     Status[3]= xxx1xxxx = calculated ion current invalid
#                                     Status[3]= xx1xxxxx = maximum feedback wait period exceeded
#     SOURCE_NAME                     C2>Cluster spacecraft 2
#     DATA_TYPE                       PP>Prime Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      ASP>Active Spacecraft Potential Control
#     DATA_VERSION                    01
#     TITLE                           ASPOC Ion Current>spin averages
#     TEXT                            W. Riedler et al, Active Spacecraft Potential Control,
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., 79,  pp 271 - 302, 1997)
#     MODS                            none
#                                     Reference Document for CSDS CDF File Design, DS-QMW-TN-0003
#     ADID_REF                        ECLUASP2
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 C2_PP_ASP_00000000_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  C2_PP_ASP
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Cluster Spacecraft 2, ASPOC Prime Parameters
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Cluster
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     PI_NAME                         W. Riedler
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  IWF-OAW
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Refer to CSDS for rules of acknowledgement
#     GENERATED_BY                    Austrian Cluster Data Centre at IWF, Graz
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2001-01-09T09:09:09.000Z
#     INST_MODE                       C2>ASP>0>2000-12-08T23:59:58.641Z>ASP_STDB>standby mode
#     PARENTS                         RDM>001210_1_1A
#                                     RDM>001209_1_1A
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Refer to CSDS for rules of use
#     SKELETON_VERSION                CSDS_CDF_V2.00
#     INST_SETTINGS                   none
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     SOFTWARE_VERSION                PPSP_GEN 3.2 (DEC C), 20000425
#     VALIDATE                        Compatible with the ISTP CDF Standards
#     SC_ENG_ID                       FM6>?
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Cluster
#     LINK_TEXT                       High resolution Cluster data from the
#     LINK_TITLE                      Cluster Science Archive
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/csa
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Cluster-Salsa/ASPOC/PrimeParameter/PT4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Interval centred time tag rounded to nearest msecond
#  2. ASPOC status
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 23:02:12 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                                STATUS[0]              STATUS[1]              STATUS[2]              STATUS[3]
                                (@_Status[0]_)         (@_Status[1]_)         (@_Status[2]_)         (@_Status[3]_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                                                                                             
09-12-2000 00:00:01.955                      0                      0                      0                      0
